Translations.Text: Barakatamaya te'om yara hatata sarbamaya kartrtba; arau te'om sakalo bastura oparata ksamatabana
Yijane mrtyu arau jirana srsti karaiche, yate tomalokaka paraiksa karaiba parae ye, tomalokara majata kone ata'itakai uttama amala karaiba parae? Te'om paraakramasali, atiksamasila
Yijane satakhana akasa starae starae srsti karaiche. Rahamanara srstita tumi kono trauti dekhibalai napaba; tumi akau ghurai coraa, kono trauti dekhibalai pa'ichane
tara pichata akau tumi dbitiyabara drstipata karaa, e'i drsti byartha arau klanta hai tomara phale ubhati ahiba

Niscaya ami nikatararti akasaka pradipapunjara dbaraa susobhita karaicho arau se'iboraka cayatanasakalara prati niksepara upakarana bana'icho arau sihamtara babe prastuta karaicho jbalanta agnikundara sasti
Arau yisakale nija pratipalakaka asbikara karaiche, sihamtara babe ache jahannamara sasti; arau kimana ye nikrsta se'i pratyarartanasthala
Yetiya sihamtaka tata niksepa karaa ha'ba, tata sihamte iyara bikata sabda sunibalai paba. Arau i uthali uthiba
Kraodhata i chinna-bhinna horaara upakrama ha'ba. Yetiya'i tata kono dalaka niksepa karaa ha'ba, iyara praharaisakale sihamtaka sudhiba, ‘tomalokara ocarata kono satarkakarai aha nachila ne’
sihamte ka'ba haya, 'niscaya amara ocarata satarkakarai ahichila. Tetiya ami (te'omlokaka) mithyaraopa karaichilo arau kaichilo, ‘allahe ekorae aratirna karaa na'i. Tomaloke mahabibhraantita acha’
Arau sihamte ka'ba, ‘yadi ami sunilohemtena arau bibeka-bud'dhi prayoga karailohemtena, tente ami jbalanta ju'ira adhibasi naha'lohemtena’
Phalata sihamte nijara aparaadha sbikara karaiba. Eteke dhbansa jbalanta ju'ira adhibasisakalara babe
Niscaya yisakale nedekhakai nija pratipalakaka bhaya karae te'omlokara babe ache ksama arau danara pratidana
Arau tomaloke tomalokara katha gopane koraa athaba prakasyabharae koraa, niscaya te'om antarasamuhata yi ache se'i bisaye samyaka aragata
Yijane srsti karaiche, teraemi najanibane? Athaca te'om suksmadarsi, samyaka arahita

Teraemi tomalokara babe prthiraikhanaka sugama karai diche, eteke tomaloke iyara patha-praantarata bicarana karaa arau te'omra jiraikara paraa tomaloke ahara karaa; arau te'omra ocarate'i punaraut'thana
Tomaloke te'omra paraa nirbhaya haicha neki ye, yijana akasata ache te'om tomalokaka prthiraisaha (puti pela'i) dhbansa karaiba arau hathat i (prthiraikhana) thara tharakai kampibalai dharaiba

athaba tomaloke iyara paraa nirbhaya haicha neki ye, yijana akasata ache, te'om tomalokara oparata sila barsanakarai prabala dhumuha pathaba? Tetiya tomaloke janibalai paba kenekuraa achila mora satarkabani
arau niscaya sihamtara purbarartisakale'o mithyaraopa karaichila. Phalata kenekuraa achila mora pratyakhyana (iyara sasti)

sihamte sihamtara oparata (urai phuraa) caraa'iborara prati laksya karaa na'ine, yiborae pakhi meli diye arau sankucita karae? Parama karaunamaya allahe'i e'iboraka sthira karai raakhe. Niscaya te'om sakalo bastura samyaka drasta
Parama karaunamaya allahara bahirae tomalokara ene kono sain'yabahini achene, yisakale tomalokaka sahaya karaiba? Kaphirasakala ache mathona prabancanara majata
Kona ache enekuraa, yijane tomalokaka jiraika dana karaiba yadi te'om te'omra jiraika bandha karai diye? Baram sihamta abadhyata arau bimukhatata abicala hai ache
Yi byakti nata hai mukhara oparata bhara di khoja karhe, siye'i adhika hidayata praapta, ne se'i byakti, yijane pona hai sarala pathata khoja karhe
koraa, teraemi tomalokaka srsti karaiche arau tomalokara babe srarana arau drstisakti lagate antahkaranasamuha pradana karaiche. Tomaloke khube'i kama krtajnata prakasa karaa
Koraa, teraemi tomalokaka prthiraita srsti karai prasaraita karaiche arau te'omra ocarate'i tomalokaka samabeta karaa ha'ba
Arau sihamte kaya, 'tomaloke yadi satyabadi horaa tente koraacona e'i pratisrauti ketiya bastabayita ha’ba
Koraa, e'i bisayara jnana kerala allahara ocarate'i ache. Arau ma'ito kerala spasta satarkakarai matra
Tara pichata yetiya sihamte iyaka nice'i ocarata dekha paba tetiya kaphirasakalara ceharaa mlana hai paraiba arau koraa ha’ba, ‘e'itorae'i haiche se'ito, yito tomaloke dabi karaichila’
Koraa, koraacona tomaloke.. Yadi allahe moka arau mora sangisakalaka dhbansa karai diye athaba amara prati daya pradarsana karae, tente kaphirasakalaka yantranadayaka sastira paraa kone raksa karaiba
koraa, teraemi parama karaunamaya. Ami te'omra oparate'i imana anicho arau te'omra oparate'i bharasa karaicho. Gatike tomaloke anatipalame janibalai paba kone spasta bibhraantita ache
Koraa, tomaloke bhabichane, yadi tomalokara pani bhugarbhata guci yaya, tetiya kone tomalokaka prabahamana pani ani diba
